channel.title: Shops?
channel.description:
[code]java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: -90 at client.parseIncomingPackets(client.java:20157) at client.packetProcess(client.java:18957) at client.packetSending(client.java:18910) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:155) at server.main(server.java:51) retribution Server [fatal] - exception Game saved for player retribution ClientHandler: Client retribution disconnected. [/code]
That error appears in my runserver and it kicks me off when I try to trade some of my shops...So...Invalid items, huh? Well...I took everything out of the shops and it still happens...Any help?

item.title: Shops?
item.dc:creator: @Setsuna Setsuna
item.description:
@Setsuna wrote:

Nope. I know to use tabs in cfg files…

Read full topic

item.title: Shops?
item.dc:creator: @ChaosPkers ChaosPkers
item.description:
@ChaosPkers wrote:

When you modified them did you use spaces instead of tabs?
